description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This isn't an expedition to mine or craft! We're here to battle! Take your avatar online for a showdown in a fully destructible and customizable world! Tag other players and avoid getting knocked out as you shoot to be the best!
description.short: This isn't an expedition to mine or craft! We're here to battle! Take your avatar online for a showdown in a fully destructible and customizable world! Tag other players and avoid getting knocked out as you shoot to be the best!
